author: Staff Reporter
text:
A case of violation of model code of conduct was filed by Thoothukudi south police on Wednesday against DMK men — the party’s district secretary N. Periyasami, town secretary Anandasekaran, taluk secretary Sarathy and 47th ward councillor Ramakrishnan.

Without obtaining permission from Returning Officer to Thoothukudi assembly constituency, they opened an office on the 12th street at Bryant Nagar here to carry out poll-related works.

According to a statement from the Returning Officer S. Gopala Sundara Raj, the flying squad personnel had been enquiring those violated the model code of conduct. Prior to opening any party office, holding election campaigns at public places and by vehicles, permission should be obtained from the Returning Officer.
title: Four DMK men booked for code violation
